website_summaries.verdict: Includes 5 layers of protection to allow the smartphone to survive a drop.
pros: Nearly two dozen different colors and styles
Even with a rugged design, it won't add much weight to the phone
Case features a honeycomb design that gives you the sturdy grip you want
Cool design for a rugged case
cons: Plastic materials used in the case may not justify its high price tag

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case
customer_reviews.text: This case completely changed the feel and experience of my phone. I had the lifeproof case on originally and that was a good case but I wanted something different. With this case it feels much better in my hand and it highlights the phone better. I’m addition the carbon fiber on the back looks super sleek and cool. The carbon fiber case itself just adds an extra sleek look to my iPhone X. The only downfall to this case is I feel the bottom lip of the case is slightly too loose and I imagaine it will only get looser as time passes.
customer_reviews.author: jareem

customer_reviews.title: Not my best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I expected quite a bit more for the price. The overall material quality and durability is relatively low... compared to Otterbox it's very low quality. Which surprised me based off the price point and the reviews given, I was anticipating something MUCH better than what was received. My suggestion would be to over look the Otterbox cases as the interior quality (that actually protects the phone) is much much better and more thought out that what was cheaply pieced together with this case.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Multi-layer Protection!! No bulk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product; great protection, light weight and no bulk. Not knocking the “Otterbox” product line but their bulk does provide great protection as well but who wants to have a thin light weight phone Incase in a bulky case, if your that clumsy and need the otter box bulk for protection you may want to stick to a land line and not a 1k cellular phone. You’ll really like this case,
customer_reviews.author: Smartlab Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Rough and Ready
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I love the beauty and precision of the iPhone 10, but by itself, I feel like I am holding a fine expensive, and FRAGILE, piece of expensive CHina. I prefer holding something substantial in my hand, and the Urban Gear fits that description perfectly. Along with a Max Boost screen protector, with this case on, I feel much more comfortable. Time will tell about how protective it is, but initiall, I like what I see.
customer_reviews.author: nemo's dogs

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and slightly rugged
customer_reviews.text: I expected a little bit more thickness or ruggedness as it advertised. Still, I like the case. The carbon fiber looks cool and anodized rubber on the sides feel great when holding or talking as far as grip goes. I give 👍👍 updaye6/18 I dropped from waist high and it totally absorbed a screen belly buster on the hardwoods in the house with no problems! Carbon look very cool! Love the graphics showing as well.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Like others, we have been loyal Otterbox users. After reading reviews for the cases for the new iPhone Xs, I was concerned that the Otterbox might not be the best choice. It seemed like a good time to try something new with great reviews. I really like the feel of the Monarch carbon fiber case. While it's not heavy, it is very sturdy. I haven't dropped the phone (yet), but other reviewers have had good results (and no damage). I added a screen protector, and I'm very happy with this case. It is a bit expensive, but the phone is really expensive. I want it well protected.
customer_reviews.author: A Jersey Vegan Family

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Monarch and it's fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love the Monarch. I had an iPhone 7 Plus that I must have dropped no less than 7,653 times within about 1 year. I'm already on drop number 64 with my new iPhone X and I'm really happy. The corners are especially brilliant. The slight edge above the glass has saved me several times as well. Seriously, this is one of the best if not the best case out there.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sondreal

customer_reviews.title: Highly protective with out the bulk, Gorgeous cases.
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the cellular business in one form or another for over 25 years. This is by far the best case design that I have come across. It provides excellent protection while no ruining the look of your device. The build quality is second to none. Buy it, period. Mobile Mike.
customer_reviews.author: jacuzz

customer_reviews.title: Is $1200 of phone worth a slight more expensive case? Damn right when that case is high quality
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to hold. The side buttons have a very good feel to them, a positive feel unlike some other mushy ones I have experienced on friends' phones. A bit pricier than others, but I feel that this one is worth the extra ... especially with a $1200 cell phone. The fit is perfect, easy both ON and OFF and ON again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Knack

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. The edge material seems just a little softer than I would have expected when bending it but the back has almost no flex to it whatsoever. Have had a few dropped from pocket height and to issues. good grip along the sides when holding the phone and makes the phone seem more blocky than round (almost like going back to the iPhone 5 shape) but if it protects my phone then I don’t mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for our 3 new iPhone X. Really impressed. Looked at a lot of cases and decided these were it. While it’s hard to say how well they will work if we drop a phone without actually doing it, I am fairly confident they will protect the phones. Really great quality, feels good in the hand and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case but wrong item
customer_reviews.text: The build quality on the Trooper cas I received is good. Amazon denied my last review though. I ordered the iPhone X Monarch case and received the Trooper case instead. Amazon Warehouse deals are a real gamble, you never know what you are truly getting. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: CodeBreaker

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone Case
customer_reviews.text: It is a great sturdy case for my iPhone. It fits perfectly and has a rubberized honeycomb textured sides that’s for easy grip. Also easy to put on and slightly raised front side so when you lay the front, the iPhone never touch the flat surface. Pricey, but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Etten

customer_reviews.title: Not-so-great Fit
customer_reviews.text: For a case this expensive it doesn’t fit the phone very well. The top and bottom flexible edges aren’t square with the sides. Makes the phone look like a cheap knock off from the front. Maybe it just messes with my OCD. The case itself looks nice, and feels durable. I have no doubt it provides adequate fall protection. It’s just the less-than-ideal fit coupled with the price that brings this case down.
customer_reviews.author: Bantha Poodoo 24

customer_reviews.title: Favorite phone case
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite phone case out of the many I've tried across the various phones I've had. It easily fit, it's light and it's easy to hold without having to add any sort of grip to it. That it looks great makes it even better. I'll gladly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: 4 month review
customer_reviews.text: Just get it. I constantly drop my iPhone X, and not only does the phone survive every drop, but the case does not show any wear - not even a scratch- after 4 months!. The ribbed type backing also makes the phone easy to hold. At well ver $1,000 my iPhone XS must be protected, and I feel strongly this is a great product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: DEA-2248

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, durable and overall awesome phone case
customer_reviews.text: Overall, love this phone case. The only reason I gave the case 4 out of 5 stars is the fact that it lacks a screen protector. That is the only fault I can find with the case, wish screen protection was included. Previously had a Lifeproof Fre and had so many issues with the functionality of my iPhone X all stemming from the case. Since I’ve used the UAG case all the issues have disappeared and I actually like my phone again. Case is lightweight but tough. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: amy alderson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The past 3 iPhones I had all of them had a UGA case. Well my iPhone X had a pelican case but the bottom part of the rubber came off. So I had to order a new case then I said well my other phones had UGA so might as well go with them. Honestly these case are so good and help your phone from drops or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Second time as good as the first
customer_reviews.text: Had the same case for my prior phone and liked it a lot so I got it again for the iPhone XS and the quality is as expected - very durable, high quality, looks great, and keeps the expensive handheld computer device safe as it could be! Great product and I would buy it a third time for my next phone too.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case.
customer_reviews.text: The Monarch is an exceptional case. The build is excellent, the materials feel great in the hand. The look is awesome. The fit is perfect-easy to install and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is the third UAG case I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It is the third UAG case I have used on my iPhones. I like it much better than the other two name brands that I have used in the past. It is light, not too bulky and as protective as any of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I shopped a lot and finally decided on this UAG case for my iphone x. It's very comfortable and well designed. Easily taken on and off. Sides don't restrict finger movement. Comfortable in my front pocket. Reviews are all very good.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: They offer amazing protection to any device.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th UAG case I have purchased for myself of immediate family and my son loves it for his new phone. On a whim I purchased my first UAG case about 4 years ago and used it daily with a phone for 3 years. My husband is prone to breaking his phones due to dropping them. This is the first time I haven't had to get his phone replaced every few months. It's still completely intact and the phone looks brand new when you take the cases off. I recommend these cases to everyone I know. They are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Redden

customer_reviews.title: Love this Case
customer_reviews.text: Received this case last week after using an X-Doria defense. This case is fantastic, the carbon fiber looks amazing and the case is very protective. I have always been impressed with the quality of UAG products and have one of their cases on my IPAD as well. If you are looking for a rugged, nice looking case for your Iphone X/Xs then look no further as this is a great case and I would highly recommend it and other UAG products.
customer_reviews.author: rob r

customer_reviews.title: Looks durable
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be durable. The corners stick out like they would perfect it in a fall. The camera is recessed about an 1/8 of an inch.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect IphoneX fit.  Works with Wireless
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. Sharp looking and works with my wireless charger. Still, it’s a case that protects the back and sides. Nothing for screen, but I’ve never broke a screen with this style.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Yea you need this
customer_reviews.text: Well made Fits great Buttons are not the easiest to use and the material is slicker than it should be. Protection is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Good grip, look and protection.
customer_reviews.text: I love the indented back to this as it gives me a nice niche to grab onto it a bit compared to the flat-back case I used to have. The carbon fiber gives it a nice 3-D look too. Dropped it - but not big hard drops - a few times in past couple of months and no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Ski VT

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Best case I’ve ever bought, I had an emergency once and had to throw my phone. Phone worked and not a scratch on the case even after landing on concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Marshmallowman

customer_reviews.title: Best case I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I had the UAG Monarch for my Galaxy S8+ and loved it. So I went with it again on my iPhone X. It is thin and lightweight plus very protective. I prefer cases with a built in screen protector but I’m guessing the revenue from selling them separate is too high these days (fought I hate you otter box), so I go with this one. I like it better anyway.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chiusano

customer_reviews.title: UAG=best phone cases period and I have owned all of ...
customer_reviews.text: UAG=best phone cases period and I have owned all of them at one point or another. Its the one I keep coming back to for its simplistic yet advanced design, style and minimalism.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy James

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Like the carbon fiber backing, really doubt the metal screws do anything as far as protection, other than Aesthetics. Case is very good have dropped my phone unfortunately multiple times & no impact to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Another awesome UAG case, one of the best on the market
customer_reviews.author: Jason K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great case!
customer_reviews.text: It feels great in my hand and looks awesome at the same time. What really drew my attention to the case was the carbon fiber and it looks so good and you can tell that it was also built to protect, without being super bulky! It adds a really cool look to the phone, making it look sleek and well engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing. It manages to have the same protection as my bulky otter box I used to have on my phone while looking pretty cool. The plastic parts feel a little cheep and the carbon fiber part only looks good in certain lights, but it definitely gets the job done. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Great case as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great case as expected. Premium price, though you do get what great protection. Already dropped the X! Eeek! No worries though, phone is fine. Fifth case purchased between my two kids and I.
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest case I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest case I’ve ever owned. My iPhone will never have another case. Feels great in your hand non slipping, great grip. Phone feels very safe in this case
customer_reviews.author: ravi

customer_reviews.title: Is this Case really worth it??
customer_reviews.text: It all boils down to this: There is the UAG Monarch Case. With its super, light-weight composite construction, top-notch protection on ALL ends, and extra quality paid to every detail. Then, there are all the rest of the cases out there. End.. of Story.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: It works well fits well doesn’t impede hearing
customer_reviews.text: Great for active, accident prone, or just on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking case that protects your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of UAG this case doesn’t disappoint. It feels good in the hand the buttons give awesome feedback very clicky. I love the design of the monarch cause it the slim design and durability. I’ve dropped my phone with this case a couple of times and there isn’t any scuffs. I’d recommend this product if you don’t want an average looking case that’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking and tough!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Awesome looking with the carbon and feels super tough! Won’t test it but I feel it is better than other back only cases. Looks bad a$$ too!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mpls

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t have it any other way, been using these cases for years!
customer_reviews.author: Sean D

customer_reviews.title: Great cases. I really enjoy the slim design but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cases. I really enjoy the slim design but these have become a lot more pricey compared to even a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone protection. A little flashy but that subjective. It is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Superb Case with rock solid protection!!!
customer_reviews.text: UAG is a tough brand and it is shown in their products. The case is excellent for the iPhone X. it is light, sleek and simple but they have not compromised on protection. I love how the case looks on my phone. I have noticed that the midnight black version of this case is available on bestbuy.com. Hope it becomes availble in Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: Vino Varghese

customer_reviews.title: CF
customer_reviews.text: Best phone cases out there. You’ve got a ton of choices, but if you try a UAG, you’ll never look back.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Conrad

customer_reviews.title: The only one I want to pay for cell phone case ever!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to get the case which is reliable and made with high-impact materials. If anyone who agree what I try to say is looking for the case, UAG is the right one definitely. I believe that you won't see any broken and deformed unless you throw or pound it intentionally (I think it would be ok even though you would like I said)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J Kye

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, feels great, looks great. Protects my iPhonr X well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Greenland

customer_reviews.title: Bought the monarch , received the Pathfinder...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one UAG, the monarch carbon fiber (SKU: IPHX-M-X) received the Pathfinder black (SKU: IPHX-A-BK). Great product, nevertheless, not what I bought...
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Monari

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and protection!
customer_reviews.text: Using this case, I am confident that my new iPhone XS is well protected.
customer_reviews.author: nanfran

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Light, and Tough
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! I used to be a minimalist case guy - but the carbon fiber monarch case looks so sleek - and it still doesn’t detract too much from the sleek form factor. The build quality seems very high and the fit is great. This is my first UAG case, and I’m certainly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Wayland Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had the case for about 3 months and dropped my phone twice with full confidence that my phone would be fine. This case is a must buy for people who want a protective case also keeping the phone slim and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Markell

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: iPhone X seems to move on it's own no matter what surface it's lying on...this put an end to the worry.
customer_reviews.author: Wyndell Francis

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My favorite case so far. Excellent grip, sturdy materials, fits snug and most importantly on the phone face side the edges extend enough past the front of the the phone to offer additional protection should it fall flat or nearly flat on the phones face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best smartphone protections
customer_reviews.text: I only buy UAG brand, this is one of the best protection for my iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone case and comfortable to grip. Bought the carbon fiber trim and so far, in regards to appearance and feel, it seems to be the best case I’ve ever bought. In my opinion, it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Strong case
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect fit to my iPhone X. I am a contractor. In I’m contantly working and on the phone. Of course I’ve dropped this phone now over 5 times not even a scratch on the case. Great product
customer_reviews.author: David Padua

customer_reviews.title: wireless charges fine, easily fits in my pocket with jeans or ...
customer_reviews.text: This the 3rd iPhone cover I’ve used for my last 3 phones, I won’t use any.other and I’ve tried many, simple, wireless charges fine, easily fits in my pocket with jeans or slacks. Best protection by far.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert R Price

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Looks sharp, not slippery, edges that hold phone in place could be firmer as trash gets in. Decent protection as I’ve dropped phone from waist height without breaks. All in all, a good case!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: reliable, sturdy, sleek, slim, simply beautiful
customer_reviews.text: very slim, sleek design. has a very nice grip and feels like you can use it like a brick that you can just bash peoples heads in if ever you needed to. always had UAG for my phones. it doesn't disappoint. legit armor.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: was not good. You could easily push the rubber strip below ...
customer_reviews.text: I personally didn't care for the overall quality of this case. I also thought it was way over priced for what I received. I thought the top, sides and back were fairly solid, but the flimsy strip of rubber across the bottom, above the speakers and charge port, was not good. You could easily push the rubber strip below the top of the phone with your finger, leaving the bottom of the phone exposed. This could easily lead to fall damage. The chance of damage here might be small, but on an uneven surface drop it's possible. I decided to exchange this phone case for the Zizo Bolt. For $17.00 I felt I got more for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Hitthespot

customer_reviews.title: Solid yet not bulky
customer_reviews.text: Functionality of buttons, camera, interface is unuobstructed and unlimited. Very solid case. Still haven’t really tested it’s main purpose. But if it should happen, I am quite confident it will perfectly protect the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bele

customer_reviews.title: Grandson happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 15 year old grandson - Christmas. He LOVES THE LOOK AND FEEL - WINNER!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever
customer_reviews.text: Best case ever, love the way carbon fiber looks. This is my 4th puchase of UAG cases and it always satisfies me 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Kerolos Hany

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great phone case so far. Easy on, easy off. Looks good and has a nice feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: donkSwampy

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: it was shipped from the UK and was hard to return
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Cool phone case
customer_reviews.text: Cool phone case. Durable but also sleek. I thought it was going to have a screen protector but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: daryl bullington

customer_reviews.title: Good but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Got one for iPhone X. Felt nice and looked cool. Didn’t like the bottom part as it could be alittle soft. Over all case is nice but definitely over priced. I returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Skitty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had lifeproof, otter boxes, this is hands down best case I’ve ever owned. I’ve dropped my 10 a handful of times and not one crack. I only recommend UAG
customer_reviews.author: Coy Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. Great grip, great design. Phone seems to be secured and protected.
customer_reviews.author: A.Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Haven't dropped my phone yet to test it out but fits great on the iPhone X and absolutely love the design and sleekness.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who is in the military. It is a great product and is very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kopish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unique design
customer_reviews.text: Case is stunning. It is perfect for both male and females who like that rugged look. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful carbon fiber.
customer_reviews.text: Carbon fiber looks beautiful. Had one of these cases on my iPhone 6s for two and a half years, wouldn’t buy anything different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I buy UAG Cases for all my products the best cases on the market .
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great case so far
customer_reviews.text: Great case so far, had it on my iPhone X for about a week, it fits snug & appears to be made of high quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Bevel isn’t deep enough
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had 3 UAG cases over the years and had been extremely happy with them. Unfortunately this case is a different story. The first issue is related to the bevel on this case isn’t deep enough to prevent your screen from smacking the floor and cracking, especially if you have a screen protector on. The second is that the phone falls out if you smack it in the right place. Overall not a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: IAmGroot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Design, Solid build quality. Phone feels safe and almost indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: vashish

customer_reviews.title: This case is fantastic. It looks and FEELS amazing
customer_reviews.text: This case is fantastic. It looks and FEELS amazing. The Carbon Fiber feels so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case + glass screen protector = 1k safe from damage
customer_reviews.author: alex9901

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Case!
customer_reviews.text: A tremendous case. Very strong material. Fits phone, like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: the surface 3 case and now this beautiful iPhone X case
customer_reviews.text: I have the iPad Pro case, the surface 3 case and now this beautiful iPhone X case. Great quality of products and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Collects dust
customer_reviews.text: Collects dust in the camera hole portion but otherwise it's a great case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be better for how expensive it is
customer_reviews.text: The case is ok...I thought it would be better for how expensive it is. would not buy it again unless the price was about $25.00 because that s about all it is worth. definitely not worth $60.00
customer_reviews.author: ron carlton

customer_reviews.title: Case frame too thin and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking case, fits well. The part of the case at the bottom of the phone near the lightning port is way too thin and flexible, it broke in less than two weeks of pretty gentle use.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, it’s lightweight and it slips in and out ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, it’s lightweight and it slips in and out of the pocket easy, so good I bought one for my wife’s phone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fiala

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE overall fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE overall fit and feel. They charge you an arm and let for 'carbon fiber' and it is cheap, knock-off, wanna-be carbon-fiber. I will NOT recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SEXY SWAMI AKA BUGGA SWAMI VIDYANANDA

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Item that came was not carbon fiber even though it was advertised as such. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lonam

customer_reviews.title: 95 for this cover and it feels like a $5 cover
customer_reviews.text: Paid $55.95 for this cover and it feels like a $5 cover. Ordered black but received a red one. I feel like the description was misleading, it showed “5-layer protection” but appears to be one layer of low-quality rubber. Thank you Amazon for free returns, can’t send it back fast enough!
customer_reviews.author: w8liftn

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with wireless charging!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a case UAG is great! It does a great job of protecting the phone. However, with the iPhone X this case is just a case. It does not allow for wireless charging. If that is what you are looking for, look elsewhere as this is not compatible./ Other than that I have had numerous UAG cases and they are all great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get a good tempered glass screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

product_meta.title: URBAN ARMOR GEAR UAG iPhone Xs/X [5.8-inch Screen] Case Monarch [Graphite] Rugged Military Drop Tested Protective Cover
product_meta.description: Color:GraphiteUrban Armor Gear products reflect the independent spirit of our designers and represent a dedication to superior quality and craftsmanship. UAG Monarch Series is built with quality materials consisting of 5 protective layers. Starting with UAG’s signature armor frame and shock-resistant core, layered with top-grain leather, a polycarbonate shear plate, and alloy metal hardware-all wrapped in impact-resistant rubber. Monarch cases feature upgraded side grips with honeycomb traction designed to provide a firmer grip, as well as oversized tactile buttons for precise use. The design of the camera opening provides a glare-free flash, ensuring that the case doesn’t interfere with the quest for flawless photos.
feature_bullets: Handcrafted, feather-light construction with 5 layers of protection with top grain leather & metal hardware
UAG Monarch iPhone cases are Apple Pay & wireless charging compatible
Features soft impact-resistant core & honeycomb traction grip
Ultra-responsive tactile buttons deliver a crisp, clean click-feel for improved functionality
Meets 2X military drop-test standards (MIL STD 810G 516.6) and comes with a 10-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
